description: Dictionary describing the application versions for which the messages should be displayed. Use `global` for all versions.

^[a-zA-Z0-9]*$.description: ONLY FIRST ITEM WILL SHOW IN WALLET.

id.description: Unique identifier for the message. Used by wallet to know

purpose.description: Add additional semantics to the purpose of the message. May be used in UI to indicate style variants

title.description: Short headline that introduces the issue at hand

text.description: Additional context to explain what the issue concerns

img.description: URL or data-uri of an image

publishedAt.description: Estimate date time at which the message has been published

learnMoreUrl.description: URL to additional resources such as blog or forum post

dismissible.description: Whether or not the message can be dismissed by the user

activeFiatProviders.description: All the active fiat onramp providers that will be displayed in the wallet

bitcoinEnabled.description: Determines whether or not the use of bitcoin is enabled in the wallet

bitcoinSendEnabled.description: Determines whether or not the use of sending bitcoin is enabled in the wallet

maxValuesEnabled.description: Whether or not the maximum values are enabled

maxValues.description: Low, middle, and high max values for fee estimations

minValuesEnabled.description: Whether or not the minimum values are enabled

minValues.description: Low, middle, and high min values for fee estimations

nftMetadataEnabled.description: Determines whether or not we display nft metadata in the wallet

recoverUninscribedTaprootUtxosFeatureEna.description: Determines whether or not the recover uninscribed taproot utxos feature is enabled

enabled.description: Enable provider to display them in the buy page
